createClusterContent: To create a new cluster, you'll be redirected to Cluster Manager. Don't worry, you'll be redirected back here afterwards so you can install OpenShift Data Science.
createClusterLabel: Create a new cluster with the installation prerequisites
createClusterDescription: We didn’t detect any clusters. To install OpenShift Data Science, create a new cluster that meets the prerequisites.
heroCallToActionButton: Learn more about OpenShift Data Science
heroDescription: Accelerate your data science. OpenShift Data Science is a managed cloud service for data scientists and developers of intelligent applications. Within a fully supported sandbox, it allows businesses to rapidly develop, train, and test artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) models using Red Hat and partner technology.
heroTitle: Get started with Red Hat OpenShift Data Science
installClusterContent: The OpenShift Data Science add-on will be installed on the selected cluster. If you want to remove it later, you can do so by accessing the Add-ons menu in Cluster Manager.
installClusterDescription: We detected clusters that meet the pre-requisites for installing OpenShift Data Science.
installClusterTitle: Install OpenShift Data Science on your cluster
upgradeClusterSelectDescription: We'll automatically install OpenShift Data Science after the upgrade.
upgradeClusterDescription: We detected your clusters, but none meet the installation prerequisites. To install OpenShift Data Science, you can upgrade an existing cluster, or create a new one that meets the prerequisites.
videoSectionInThisVideo: In this video you’ll learn how to quickly build and deploy artificial intelligence and machine learning models using Red Hat and partner technology tools.
videoSectionTitle: Demo of Red Hat OpenShift Data Science
